title: Rules
description: Just a few simple rules on this blog
contents:
Football means the real football here, not the American one.
Match, not game.
Draw, not tie.
Pitch, not field.
Table, not standings.
Nil, not zero/zip/nothing/whatever.
Boots, not cleats.
Kit, not uniform.
What else?

Cereals, pancakes, and waffles are desserts.
